text: “Ndipo pamene adauzidwa: “Khalani mu Mzinda uwu (Yerusalemu), ndipo idyani m’menemo paliponse pamene mwafuna, ndipo nenani (polowa mu mzindamo uku mutawerama): “Tifafanizireni machimo athu, (E Inu Mbuye wathu)!” Ndipo lowerani pa chipata (chake) modzichepetsa; tikukhululukirani zolakwa zanu ndipo tiwaonjezera zabwino ochita zabwino
